game.name: Cities: Skylines
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Remote Play on Tablet, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cities: Skylines is a modern take on the classic city simulation. The game introduces new game play elements to realize the thrill and hardships of creating and maintaining a real city whilst expanding on some well-established tropes of the city building experience.

reviewHighlights.text: My brother played this game on my account when he was recovering from chemo. He absolutely loved it. He highly recommends it. P.S. He is doing great.
Good game but 10$ but not at 200$ (for all the dlc) nah honestly this company makes good games but are too greedy
